# Grace (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 226

Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
